title: Great
review: It's just a brilliant film. Great story, fantastic actors... 10/10

title: Very simple review
review:
Emotions + Real life animal face = the same face for every occasion.Example:Dad dies: -__-
Finds true love: -__-
Mom sees son for first time in 830 years: -__-The movie is 2h of excellent CGI.

title: A criticism of society, with the use of Joker.
review:
This movie is so well directed, that you can enjoy it even without knowing anything about the Batman/Joker saga.
A masterpiece that raises questions and makes us wonder if in this society, all of us aren't 'Jokers'.
